name: DVD2AVI File
summary: Learn about .D2V files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: D2V files can be opened with TMPGEnc, which is included with the DVD2AVI program. The D2V format is considered a "pass-through" file since the video files are passed through the D2V file to the TMPGEnc video encoder.

description: Project file generated by DVD2AVI that contains instructions on how to process a group of video files; typically links to several .VOB files with notes about how to process each one; often used for encoding video.
